anthar jathika krikat kawunsilaya sanwidhanaya karana 2012 wissayi 20 loka kusalana krikat tharagawaliya shri්ra lankawedi pawathwimata thiranaya wiya.singappuruwedi pawathi anthar jathika krikat kawunsilaye widhayaka kamitu raswimedi me thiranaya gath bawa shri lanka krikat athuru kamitu lekam nishantha ranathunga mahatha pawasiya.emenma 2014 wissayi 20 loka kusalana krikat tharagawaliya bangladeshayedi 2013 champiyan kusalana krikat tharagawaliya engalanthayedi ha 2015 loka kusalana ki්rakat tharagawaliya oste්raliyawe ha engalanthayedi pawathwimata thiranaya wiya. 2013 pawathwimata niyamitha kantha loka kusalana krikat tharagawaliye sathkaraka rata lesa indiyawa nam keruni.anthar jathika krikat kawunsilaye widhayaka kamitu raswimedi wissayi 20 loka kusalana ki්rakat tharagawaliyata sahabhagiwana ratawal sankhyawa wadikirimata thiranaya wi atha.

asgiri parshwaye jyeshta karaka sangha sabhika mahiyangana rajamaha wiharasthanaye wiharadhipathi rajakiya panditha pujya urulawaththe dhammarakkhitha nayaka swamin wahanse pradhanathwayen ha sanwidhanathwayen duruthu pohoya nimiththen aithihasika mahiyangana rajamaha wiharasthanaye dhana shila bhawana adi aagamika wadasatahan rasak heta (12) dina sanwidhanaya kara atha.
wena ayek ohuta mese kiyayi.- ´´pinwatha, oba kiyana ee aathmaya atha, eya nathayi nokiyami.
ohuta mulma giya rachana kara aththe siya piyanan ya.
pasuwa me pilibadawa ithama kadinamin parikshanayak pawathwiya yuthu bawa danwu janadhipathiwaraya jyeshta niyojyaya polispathiwarayata itha thadin kiya sitiyeya.
me sama natyayak athulathata pulul samaja deshapalana dakmak ohu idiripath kala.
idiriyedith apa karunu heli karanawa“ shri lanka krikat nisi baladhari, palath sabha palath palana ha krida amathyansha lekam kamal padmasiri mahatha pawasiya.
wedin akka, gampaha loku akka, soduru gaweshaka, dematagoda hikanala ee athara wiya.

ghantaraya, sora gena giya.
